@Configuration @Requires(classes={org.hibernate.SessionFactory.class,javax.persistence.Entity.class})

Package io.micronaut.configuration.hibernate.jpa

This package contains a configuration for Hibernate and JPA.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HibernateCurrentSessionContextClassProvider
    Provides the value for AvailableSettings.CURRENT_SESSION_CONTEXT_CLASS.
    TransactionalSession
    Represents a transaction aware session that can be dependency injected.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EntityManagerFactoryBean
    A factory bean for constructing the EntityManagerFactory.
    JpaConfiguration
    Configuration for JPA and Hibernate.
    JpaConfiguration.EntityScanConfiguration
    The entity scan configuration.

Package io.micronaut.configuration.hibernate.jpa Description

This package contains a configuration for Hibernate and JPA.
Since:
1.0
Author:
graemerocher
